title: Frontend: Create SetGoalRow component for individual set inputs
Exercise schemes not persisted/displayed after reload on workout detail route
description: After editing and saving exercise schemes on the workout edit page, the data appears to save successfully. However, after refreshing the page (F5), the exercise schemes are displayed as unconfigured on the user workout detail route. Need to verify: 1) Are schemes actually being persisted to the database? 2) Is the detail route correctly fetching and displaying the persisted schemes?
close_reason: Fixed by adding loadAssignmentsForWorkout method to UserExerciseSchemesStore and calling it in both workout-detail and workout-edit components. The issue was that exercise scheme assignments were persisted to the database but never loaded on page refresh, causing them to appear unconfigured.

title: Workout run route fails on refresh and log creation has FK constraint error
description:
Two related issues:
1. Refreshing on /user/workouts/{id}/run gives WorkoutNotFound error
2. Creating workout log fails with SQLITE_CONSTRAINT_FOREIGNKEY - the original_workout_id references a non-existent record

The error shows the upsert is trying to use userWorkoutId (634256e1-ed8c-4f3a-88fd-2e9da29d2896) as original_workout_id but the foreign key constraint fails.
close_reason:
Fixed two issues in workout-run.ts:

1. FK Constraint Error: Changed originalWorkoutId from currentWorkout.id (user_workout ID) to currentWorkout.workoutTemplateId (compendium workout template ID) to match the database schema which references compendium_workouts.template_id

2. Refresh Issue: Changed constructor to use effect() to wait for workout data to be available from the store before calling loadWorkoutPlan(), fixing the race condition on page refresh
